name: KTPIKFS
description: This is my first game, I spent 5 days on it, deliberately setting such limits so as not to stretch it out and not turn it into a dream game. You will have to visit a kingdom that has been taken over by plants. Why do you have to go there? You had no choice, your path was blocked by it. The kingdom is dangerous, you have to avoid everything that can start a fight. Let's see if you can make it through without dying
